guide-desktop: The Base æpp can currently work only when opened in a single browser tab. If you have any additional instances (tabs) of the Base æpp open, please close them.

welcome.note: Send & receive AE, explore æpps and manage accounts.

send.note: Transfer to accounts and subaccounts. Receive by sharing your address.

aepps.note: Bring the power of æternity blockchain to your daily life.

subaccounts.note: Create dedicated accounts for spending, storage and to fuel æpps.

recover.title: Recover Account
recover.guide: Enter <dizzySymbolEmoji /> your <alternative>recovery phrase</alternative>. From the <secondary>backup</secondary> you made.

login.guide: <primary>Hello!</primary> <wavingHandEmoji /> <secondary>Log in</secondary> to æternity with your password

list.note: æpps running on the æternity blockchain will be added below.

address.name: Address
address.explanation: This aepp asks for access your public address.

transactions.explanation: {appName} involves an auction. The æpp will prepare a transaction, you are in charge of confirming it.

identicon.content: Recognize which account is active. Accounts & subaccounts have unique identicons.

account-switcher.content: Tap to switch accounts or create subaccounts.

redeem-balance.content: Tap here to import a balance from a QR code (paper wallet).

send.title: Send
send.subtitle: Transfer funds
send.note: Paste the recipient address below, scan QR code or send to subaccounts.

to.confirm-sending-to-same-account: The account you are sending from and the recipient are the same account. Are you sure you would like to send to the same account?

receive.title: Receive
receive.subtitle: Share your address
receive.note: Let others scan your QR code or share your address

list.error: An error occurred during transactions loading.
list.no-transactions: There are no transaction associated with this account.

migrated-balance.title: Tokens in migration
migrated-balance.subtitle: Not shown as balance above
migrated-balance.note: are in migration now. They will be available after the next hardfork.

redeem-balance.title: Redeem Balance
redeem-balance.subtitle: Scan QR code to redeem
redeem-balance.no-funds: There are no tokens to redeem on this network. Please make sure you are connected to the correct network and the balance has not been redeemed already.
redeem-balance.wrong-qr-code: Scanned QR code is wrong. Please make sure to scan a QR code of the redeem wallet

setup.title: AirGap Setup
setup.method-guide:
Robust security with AirGap Vault
We recommend using a secondary offline device.

install.guide:
Install AirGap on another phone
Search for AirGap.it in the store or scan this QR code.

steps:
Open AirGap on the 2nd device
Turn off the internet connection before opening AirGap.

Create secret key
No internet connection means maximum security for the key.

Write it down in the right order
You will need it for recovery.

Add an æternity wallet
Tap wallet, add wallet and choose æternity.

Link your æternity wallet
Finish by linking your vault to you æternity address.

install.guide:
Install or open AirGap on this smartphone
Open the AirGap Vault app, open the account you would like to sync, tap on the three dots in the top right corner, and select Copy Sync Code.

sync.guide:
Vault sync on the way
Paste the sync code below.

completed.guide:
Vault sync completed
Find your AirGap Vault under your accounts.

sign.guide: <primary>Scan with AirGap Vault app</primary> to sign the transaction

ledger.mobile-not-supported: Signing on mobile using Ledger is not supported now.

not-supported.note: Interacting with the Ledger is only supported by Chrome for now.

connect-guide.title: How to connect from <primary>Ledger</primary>
steps: Connect your Ledger via USB and unlock it
Open the æternity app on your Ledger
Create a first account by pressing the button below

address-confirm.create-guide: Create your address on the Ledger
address-confirm.confirm-guide: Confirm your address on the Ledger
address-confirm.create-note: To create a new account on your Ledger, confirm your address there first
address-confirm.confirm-note: To proceed, confirm your address on the Ledger

address-not-confirmed.title: Address not confirmed
address-not-confirmed.note: The Ledger cannot be used without address confirmation. Address mismatch can happen due to malware software. Please contact support to resolve this.

account-not-found.title: Account not found
account-not-found.note: The connected Ledger does not hold the specified account. You can still use it, but you have to create a new account.

request-retry.title: Request failed
request-retry.note: Ledger is not connected or the request was not confirmed.

transaction-fee.title: Define the Transaction fee
transaction-fee.note: A higher transaction fee leads to a faster transaction time.

list.personal-note: Claim a name for your account!
list.personal-explanation: Tap the “+” button below to claim a name and associate it with one of your accounts.
list.no-auctions: There are no auctions matching these criteria.

details.title: Name details
details.name: Name
details.auction-not-found: It looks like the auction you are looking for was not found.

point.guide: Set pointer of name owned by <account />
point.confirm-pointing-to-same-account: The account you are pointing to and the account, which the name currently points to, are the same account. Are you sure you would like to complete this transaction?

notification.failed: {name} was not pointed for unknown reason

transfer.confirm-transfering-to-same-account: The account you are transferring to and the account, which owns the name you are transferring, are the same account. Are you sure you would like to complete this transaction?

notification.failed: {name} was not transfered for unknown reason

notification.claim-sent: Claim for {name} name was successfully sent
notification.unknown-error: {name} was not registered for unknown reason

confirm-transaction-sign.confirm-message: Looks like you don't have enough funds to make this transaction. Are you sure want to continue?

tooltips-modal.initial-content: Tap on any {0} to learn more about its functionality.

connection-status.offline: You are offline... Please check your connection.
connection-status.no-sdk: We are unable to connect to the chosen node.
connection-status.connected-to-testnet: You are connected to a testnet.

settings.title: Remote connections
settings.count: No devices connected | {n} device connected | {n} devices connected

new.title: Remote connection
new.wrong-qr-code: Scanned QR code is wrong. Please make sure to scan a QR code generated by the Base æpp
new.camera-not-allowed: Please enable access to your camera for the mobile browser that you are using to open the Base æpp Wallet.

connect-guide.title: How to connect from <primary>Base æpp</primary>
steps: Open Base æpp on your phone: base.aepps.com
Tap on Remote Connections <icon-device /> and tap the ‘+’
Scan the QR code below with Base æpp

cancel-sign.guide: Sign the transaction in the <primary>Base æpp</primary>
cancel-sign.note: Open your Base æpp, check the transaction details and sign

modal.note: Please take 2 minutes to learn about the importance of security

list.subtitle: Security Course {n}
list.note: Revisit the courses anytime under Settings

mnemonic.title: Backup Recovery Phrase
mnemonic.subtitle: Secure your funds
mnemonic.guide: <secondary>Check the spelling</secondary> of each word and <primary>never</primary> create a screenshot or photo of this phrase.

show.guide:
Carefully keep this phrase safe!

Write these 12 words down and keep them in a safe place. You need them to recover your account in the future.
show.alert: That was too fast! Please make sure you write down the recovery phrase on paper... and keep it in a safe place.

confirm.guide:
Confirm your phrase

Tap the words below to compose your phrase, note correct order!
confirm.error: Oops! Not the correct order, try again

confirmed.guide: Would you like to <primary>delete the recovery phrase</primary> from this device? This will provide <alternative>extra security</alternative>… but it cannot be undone.

deleted.guide: You have deleted the recovery phrase from this device. <secondary>Please look for the backup that you made before deleting it.</secondary>

notification.title: Please Backup your Recover Phrase!
notification.subtitle: Secure your funds to prevent loss.

reset.title: Reset Key Storage
reset.subtitle: After resetting, a recovery is required
reset.confirm: If you haven't backup your account, you won't be able to enter it again. Are you sure?
reset.confirm-desktop: You will revoke your connection with mobile Base æpp and clear saved state. Are you sure?
